creator: dkrause@telusplanet.net
text:
code file: ssl_exp_scan.c
function:  yy_buffer_state
variable: yyconst char *str

The variable name "str" is a reserverd word in visual c++ version 5.0 and needs 
to be changed to another name in order for the compilation to continue

The file ssl_exp_scan.c seems to be a generated file which should not be
manually edited. The file also does not appear to have a function
yy_buffer_state anymore. It has a yy_load_buffer_state function but neither that
function, nor any other function in that file, contains a variable named "str".
creator: rederpj@remulak.net
